In the fourteenth century, the young Aliénor managed to treat the king of France, victim of a fistula. As a reward, she asks the sovereign to marry Bertrand de Roussillon she loves since childhood.

Argumento: A one woman documentary play based on hundreds of interviews conducted after the riots that followed the 1992 acquittal of the police officers who beat Rodney King. This is a film adaptation of the play, directed by Mark Levine with additional documentary footage.

Argumento: Tsjiboet and his two brothers grow up in a small village in Kazachstan. An old veteran tells them about a house where high officers can get the most beautiful women for free and the brothers start a search for this dreamplace.

A doctor performs a small miracle with cigar smoke. A soldier performs heroics in his lovemaking. A deaf man awakens to discover a snake has slithered down his throat. A poacher becomes his own victim.

Tragic real life story about a group of Portuguese fishermen who get caught in the middle of a storm in the Tejo river (Lisbon) and struggle to survive.

Beginning of the 80's: a politician is kidnapped and dies of heart attack during an interrogation. Before his death, the terrorists videotape his report on the exchange of money between businesspersons and politicians.
The story of seven people stuck on a remote island, quarantined by the government due to a viral outbreak.

A dark tale of working-class life in Marseilles, a city in crisis. Interesting characters include a hard-bitten but compassionate fish market worker with a drug addicted daughter and a moody bartender with a shocking secret life.

Selma, a retired nurse, is an extremely loving mother for his son Raimundo, in an almost incestuous relationship. One day, she becomes aware of some changes in her son's behavior. At first, she thinks it may be some girlfriend. But soon she learns it's something else.

Gong Li stars in this low-key drama about a single mother who will do anything to provide for her son. Sun Liying (Li) struggles to care for her hearing-impaired child Zheng Da (Gao Xin) after her taxi driver husband divorces.
Focusing on the bonding between three girls in Brooklyn's "Jackie Robinson Steppers Marching Band" and the choices the girls face once their high school closes down for asbestos removal.
Los Angeles at the end of the century.
Herbert Biberman struggles as a Hollywood writer and director blacklisted as one of The Hollywood Ten in the 1950s.
A woman becomes furious when her husband arrives home from the local pub and turns into a rat.

On the occasion of his 60th birthday, Adam organizes an extended celebration at his country home. In addition to his current wife and their young children, the guests are his previous wives, the few most important of his former lovers, and the son he has not seen in decades with his family.

Argumento: At the end of the 19th century, proud but poor fisherman Jurgaitis gets imprisoned for a crime he did not commit. His beautiful daughter Elze is sent to live with rich German merchant Michael. There she falls for his son Endrik.
An old man fights to keep the government from building a dam on his fishing river.
After a one-night stand a couple is faced with the terrifying possibility of what they really want.
A man comes to London, uses a strange force to take over different men's identities, and creates chaos.

Thomas is a bisexual man involved in several relationships. When suddenly one of his relationships, single mother Ann, dies, Thomas feels a responsibility towards her 13 year old son Gregoire. He tries to obtain custody.
Anti-Matter(Philly) is the queen of nothing, the rule of nowhere, the monarch of ciphers...

Seven seemingly unconnected fairy tales - glued together only by folklore, mood, color and light - make up this Czech collection of visual poetry. The original piece of literature, written by Karel Jaromír Erben in 1853, contained twelve tales.

Argumento: The story of an elder brother who would do anything for his younger brothers.

Andres did his time in jail following a false accusation. He doesn't care about revenge, however the unwritten Romani law bounds him to strike back.
A lonely middle-aged woman is forced by circumstance to let out her house to a film crew. She is attracted to the charming director and he exploits this fact to suit his purposes.
Three jailers, a wheelchaired man and a mentally handicapped girl climb a mountain in the alps along with their supervisors.
Jimmy Grimble is a shy Manchester school boy. However, through football, and some special boots, he manages to gain the confidence to succeed.

When tough street kid Ricky Horvath loses his beloved dog Buddy to a syndicate of vicious dognappers, he must turn to the one man he cannot forgive: his estranged grandfather, police detective Geza Horvath.

Arriving in Manhattan, the kids talk about their plans for the day in New York. Ally has been filming her friends with her new DV video camera. However, the friendly banter is disrupted by a fender bender that sets our story in motion.

A day in the life of ten Swedish actresses up for the same big Hollywood movie role.

What if every day of your pathetic life you worked yourself silly at a meaningless job and put off till tomorrow doing what you've always wanted to do? What would you try? How far would you go? As far as it takes? If so, You Are Here.
Arriving in Moscow, Danila discovers Konstantin dead and he sets out to avenge his death; a journey that leads him to Chicago and a whole new experience.
